projects.title: Visit Wonogiri
projects.description: A redesigned website of the official Wonogiri regency website, focusing on its accessibility to provide direct and simplified user experiences

projects.title: Order of The Wild: Lingo
projects.description: An English test game that is inspired by text RPG game mechanisms, aimed to combine education and entertainment to create a more engaging language learning

projects.title: Air Pollution
projects.description: A collaborative project leveraging a backend API to dynamically populate the frontend with real-time updates

projects.title: Pet Trail
projects.description: A web project that helps users report lost and found pets, view their locations on an interactive map, and receive notification through email.
